askingToFix: Asking Lumina to fix the error...
projectConfigDesc: Manage metadata and environment variables for this app.
addTagPlaceholder: Type tag and press Enter to add...
envVarsSecureNote: Values are stored securely in your local database. They are only injected into the preview sandbox when required by the code.
clickToInspectDesc: Select any element in the live preview to edit its properties.
inspectorNote: Note: This inspector performs a direct text replacement and may not work for dynamic JS content.
cleanupSuggestionDesc: Lumina detected {count} orphaned file(s) that are no longer used in your project.
offlineDesc: Visual and Property editing remains functional at no cost.
failoverToast: ⚠️ Service issue with {modelA}. Switching to {modelB} to continue.
inputNeeded: Please respond to the suggestion above...
noHistory: No snapshots available yet. Make some changes!
restoreDesc: This will revert your project to the selected state. Current changes will be saved as a new snapshot before reverting.
